job.title: Prin Eng, Software Engrg
job.description: raytheon is seeking a cleared software engineer to support the customer on a prime program in chantilly va responsibilities handling customer technical support cases through internal ticketing system instant messaging phone and email submissions escalating tickets to software and systems engineers as needed creating bug tickets and new feature requests on behalf of users updating the organization support website with knowledgebase articles and frequently asked questions providing application functional training to customers providing web design assistance to customers designing and developing in application specific programming languages javascript and php to facilitate customer design requests assisting software and system engineers by testing application changes providing graphic design support to the program manager on briefings internal communications and marketing materials qualifications and education bachelors degree in computer science or a related field to include a minimum of years of relevant experience proficiency in frontend development web programming languages such as html and css jquery and javascript proficiency in graphic design software including adobe photoshop adobe illustrator and other visual design tools understanding of uxui user experienceuser interface design experience working with any of the following web applications wordpress mediawiki phpbb experience in collecting user requirements and translating those into design and development tasks understanding of usg accessibility standards section experience working in an agile development environment excellent written and verbal communication skills superior problemsolving skills ability to learn quickly and work independently or as part of a team proficient understanding of crossbrowser compatibility issues adaptable and willing to learn new technologies ctsp raytheon is an equal opportunityaffirmative action employer all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion creed sex sexual orientation gender orientation gender identity national origin disability or protected veteran status
